Description: decodes as uintn; n*8-bit unsigned integer. Hint section defines the value of n.
decodes as intn; n*8-bit signed integer. Hint section defines the value of n.
decodes as floatn; n*8-bit float. Hint section defines the value of n.
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint8 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint16 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint24 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint32 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint40 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint48 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint64 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uint128 (block number).
A reference to a previously decoded block. Data section contains a uintn (block number).
decodes as date. Data section is the unix epoch.
decodes as 64-bit date. Data section is the 64-bit unix epoch.

Provides support for custom types. The hint section contains a reference to a constructor name, the data section contains a reference to an array of arguments. Data section is the same size as the hint section.
Indicates the start of an array
Indicates the end of an array
Indicates the start of an object
Indicates the end of an object
Sets the hint size. Data section is uint8.
Indicates the end of the serialized data.
